mapper.sql: SELECT *, (SELECT count(1) FROM pd_heat_info WHERE trigger_user_id = 10 AND activity_id = a.id) heat_count, CASE (SELECT count(1) FROM pd_heat_info WHERE trigger_user_id = 10 AND activity_id = a.id) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS is_heat FROM pd_activity_profile a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pd_activity_profile( user_id,tags,position,media_paths,media_type,longitude,latitude, geohash,status,like_num,heat_value,comment_num, enshrine_num,description, create_time,modify_time ) VALUES( #{userId} , #{tags} , #{position} , #{mediaPaths} , #{mediaType} , #{longitude} , #{latitude} , #{geohash} , 'normal' , 0 , 1 , #{commentNum} , #{enshrineNum} , #{description} , NOW() , NOW() )
mapper.delete: UPDATE pd_activity_profile SET modify_time = now(), is_valid = 2 WHERE id = #{id}
